website_summaries.verdict: Many reviewers enjoyed their first package of these luxurious, pleasantly-scented wipes, but weren't sure whether a second package was worth the price tag.
pros: Easily removes tough formulas like liquid lip color and waterproof mascara
Removes makeup, leaves skin refreshed and nourished
Originally made with milk, Korres has upgraded its formula to Greek Yoghurt
for 2.5 times more skin-nourishing proteins, vitamins, and minerals
cons: Some reviewers concluded these wipes weren't worth the price

customer_reviews.title: BEST makeup removing wipes for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recomend these wipes enough. I have sensitive skin that turns red when irritated and am a daily makeup wearer. Makeup removing wipes are a very important part of my nightly routine. After finding these, I have never looked back. These are truly my holy grail and I recommend to everyone. These gentle wipes soothe the skin while managing to remove all the debris from your day. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well at removing makeup, especially make-up. Also travels well and is easy to use. These provide more moisture than some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, I didn’t even know they made wipes but once I saw them I had to give them a try and I’m so glad I did, definitely didn’t disappoint. These wipes don’t leave an oily feel to your face which is amazing
customer_reviews.author: victoria jones

customer_reviews.title: The only Korres product I did not repurchase. Not had.  Just not good enough.
customer_reviews.text: These are good, just not great ... For the price at least. They are not wet enough. But I LOVE Korres. Best brand for me. I will stick with the regular cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: KWV

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these whips. Wish they were a bit cheaper/came in bulk packs since I use them daily. Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Left a strange film on my face when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Korres
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Large size and gets all the makeup off
customer_reviews.author: dtobey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wipes!
customer_reviews.text: So moisturizing and do a great job removing make-up. Gentle yet effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel On
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect addition to my travel "wardrobe". They work well at removing makeup and left my skin feeling fresh and soft. They were easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Been using product for over 4 years. Easy to use, effective!
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. My face feels very clean and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. My face feels very clean and no residue left.
customer_reviews.author: janene paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the Korres Greek Yoghurt products!!! Make my skin soft without drying too much.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L. Milby

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using cleansing wipes for travel. I like Clinique's but they don't always have them in stock and are rather pricey. I found Neutrogena's night time calming wipes and like them well enough. I saw these with such a good price and I love Korres products, so decided to give them a try. They are my new favorite. The cloth wipes away all of my foundation, eyeshadow, lipstick..no smearing and doesn't sting. Pleasantly scented. I will not use anything else now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. K. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Clean face
customer_reviews.text: I like these. Cleans the make up right off my face with a couple of swipes. I seem to be allergic or get break outs from other brands. I have had no problems with these. Also, i feel like my face is actually clean. There is no oils left or dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Dea574

product_meta.title: KORRES Greek Yoghurt Cleansing and Makeup Removing Wipes, 25 Wipes
product_meta.description:
The original Milk Proteins Wipes you love have been upgraded with Greek Yoghurt for 2.5 times more skin-nourishing proteins, vitamins, and minerals. Each pre-moistened, textured, and non-irritating cloth effectively removes stubborn face and eye makeup, leaving skin refreshed and deeply nourished. Perfectly packaged for on-the-go cleansing, skin is left revitalized, smooth, and hydrated. Key ingredients: - Greek Yoghurt Concentrate: Contains two and a half times the protein content of regular yogurt for advanced nourishment. - Chamomile and Calendula Oils: Calm stressed or sensitive skin. - Macadamia and Jojoba Oils: Deeply moisturize and help skin retain moisture.

BRAND STORY
Born out of a Greek homeopathic pharmacy more than 20 years ago, Korres stays true to its philosophy of striving for constant innovation while utilizing natural ingredients of the highest quality and clinically-tested efficacy.
